character_templates.professional_instructor: professional yoga instructor, athletic build, wearing navy blue yoga outfit

character_templates.diverse_group: diverse group of yoga practitioners, various body types, colorful yoga outfits

environment_templates.modern_studio: modern yoga studio, wooden floor, large windows, natural lighting
environment_templates.minimalist_studio: minimalist yoga studio, white walls, soft lighting, peaceful atmosphere

environment_templates.outdoor_deck: wooden deck outdoors, trees in background, morning light
environment_templates.home_practice: home interior, living room with plants, cozy atmosphere
environment_templates.traditional_studio: traditional yoga studio, meditation cushions, warm lighting, peaceful

negative_prompts.standard: blurry, low quality, deformed, disfigured, extra limbs, bad anatomy, poorly drawn hands, mutation, watermark, signature, text, error, cropped
negative_prompts.strict: blurry, low quality, deformed, disfigured, extra limbs, bad anatomy, poorly drawn hands, mutation, watermark, signature, text, error, cropped, worst quality, low resolution, beginner, amateur, distorted, twisted limbs, unnatural pose
negative_prompts.minimal: blurry, low quality, deformed, extra limbs, watermark

pose_specific_angles.Downward Dog: side profile view, full body, showing proper form
pose_specific_angles.Warrior 2: side view, arms extended, full body in frame
pose_specific_angles.Tree Pose: front view, standing on one leg, full body
pose_specific_angles.Triangle Pose: side view, arm reaching up, full body
pose_specific_angles.Child's Pose: side angle, peaceful expression, mat visible
pose_specific_angles.Mountain Pose: front view, standing tall, full body
pose_specific_angles.Plank Pose: side profile, straight line from head to heels
pose_specific_angles.Cobra Pose: side angle, chest lifted, face visible
pose_specific_angles.Bridge Pose: side view, hips lifted, full body
pose_specific_angles.Warrior 1: diagonal angle, arms raised, full body
pose_specific_angles.Extended Side Angle: side view, one arm extended overhead
pose_specific_angles.Half Moon: side view, balanced on one leg, full extension
pose_specific_angles.Pigeon Pose: side angle, hip opening visible, peaceful expression

example_full_prompts.basic: {character}, performing {pose_name}, {environment}, {lighting}, professional photography, high quality, detailed
example_full_prompts.cinematic: {character}, demonstrating {pose_name}, {angle}, {environment}, {lighting}, cinematic composition, shallow depth of field, professional photography, award winning, masterpiece
example_full_prompts.educational: {character}, demonstrating proper {pose_name} form, {angle}, educational yoga photography, clear body positioning, {environment}, {lighting}, instructional quality, professional

replicate_sdxl.prompt: professional yoga instructor, athletic build, wearing navy blue yoga outfit, performing Downward Dog, side profile view, modern yoga studio, natural window lighting, professional photography, high quality, detailed, sharp focus
replicate_sdxl.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, deformed, disfigured, extra limbs, bad anatomy, poorly drawn hands, mutation, watermark, signature

midjourney.prompt: professional yoga instructor, athletic build, wearing navy blue yoga outfit, performing Downward Dog pose, side profile view, modern yoga studio, wooden floor, large windows, natural lighting, professional photography, high quality --ar 2:3 --style raw --v 6
midjourney.character_consistency: [paste image URL] professional yoga instructor performing Warrior 2 pose --ar 2:3 --cref [paste image URL again] --cw 100 --v 6

local_stable_diffusion.prompt: professional yoga instructor, performing Tree Pose, yoga studio, natural lighting, professional photo, high quality
local_stable_diffusion.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, deformed, extra limbs, bad anatomy
